forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High -1C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High around 30F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers with snow becoming steadier and heavier late. Low around -5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with some snow showers this evening. A steady snow likely after midnight. Low 23F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will become steadier snow in the afternoon. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers early and steady snow likely later in the day. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with and change to freezing rain overnight. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will mix with and change to freezing rain overnight. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low around 35F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will change to a steady rain. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will change to rain as the night wears on. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
